sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,22" Text="21-02-2012 : Travis.Frisinger@dev2.co.za

Used to handle the two stages of the BPM
CI intergration.

1 : Start build [ tfs_remote_build ]
2 : Checkout SVN workflows [ svn_co ]
3 : Start Test [ test_suite ]

12-03-2012: zuko.mgwili@dev2.co.za
Moved tfs_remote_build logic to another
workflow, TFSRemoteBuild

15-05-2012: zuko.mgwili@dev2.co.za
Removed TFSRemotedBuild service from
the workflow" /> </FlowStep> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID1</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID2</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID3</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID4</x:Reference> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID5</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
